name: Limbountain
description:
Game has been developed for Weekly Game Jam and the theme was "Mountain Climber"

Use your limbs to climb the mountain (or a wall). At least two hands on the wall or one foot and one hand to go higher. You will go up only if any of your hands are above your head or your legs are bent. You can release any limb from the grip wit RMB.

Had no time for sound effects, or fixing bugs, or putting any effort into art, or scoring system, or menu, or better name.
